p: The results of this study in the total bacterium is consistent with results obtained by Ariaii, Tavakolipour, Rezaei, Elhamirad, and Bahram ( 2015) on the coating of fish fillet with carboxymethylcellulose enriched with Pimpinella Affinis essential oil and results of Jalali, Ariiai, and Fattahi ( 2016), which investigates the effect of combined alginate‚Äêcarboxymethyl cellulose coating Clove oil to the amount of TVC filigree fillet.
